ome.smuggler.core.service.file.impl

Class KeyValueFileStore<K extends util.object.Identifiable,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ome.smuggler.core.service.file.impl.KeyValueFileStore<K,V>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KeyValueStore<K,V>

    public class KeyValueFileStore<K extends util.object.Identifiable,V>
extends java.lang.Object
implements KeyValueStore<K,V>
    A KeyValueStore backed by a TaskFileStore. Each value is stored in a file and the file is keyed by the corresponding task ID. Values are (de-)serialised using provided readers/writers.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      KeyValueFileStore(TaskFileStore<K> store, SourceReader<java.io.InputStream,V> reader, SinkWriter<V,java.io.OutputStream> writer)
      Creates a new instance.

    • Constructor Detail

      • KeyValueFileStore

        public KeyValueFileStore(TaskFileStore<K> store,
                         SourceReader<java.io.InputStream,V> reader,
                         SinkWriter<V,java.io.OutputStream> writer)
        Creates a new instance.
        Parameters:
        store - the file store to use to persist the key-value pairs.
        reader - deserialises the input stream.
        writer - serialises to the output stream.

    • Method Detail

      • put

        public void put(K key,
                V value)
        Description copied from interface: KeyValueStore
        Maps a key to a value. If the specified key is already associated to a value, the old value will be overwritten.
        Specified by:
        put in interface KeyValueStore<K extends util.object.Identifiable,V>
        Parameters:
        key - identifies the mapping.
        value - the value to store.

      • modify

        public void modify(K key,
                   java.util.function.Function<V,V> operation)

        Updates the value associated to the specified key.
        Specified by:
        modify in interface KeyValueStore<K extends util.object.Identifiable,V>
        Parameters:
        key - identifies the mapping.
        operation - is given the current value, does something with it and then returns the new value.

      • remove

        public void remove(K key)
        Description copied from interface: KeyValueStore
        Deletes the mapping identified by the specified key. Does nothing if no value is currently associated to the key.
        Specified by:
        remove in interface KeyValueStore<K extends util.object.Identifiable,V>
        Parameters:
        key - identifies the mapping.
